name: Framer X
title: A visual cheat-sheet for the 45 keyboard shortcuts found in Framer X. This application is MacOS-only.

cards.title: Intro
cards.body: A visual cheat-sheet for the 45 keyboard shortcuts found in Framer X. This application is MacOS-only.

cards.title: Tools
cards.body:
| Shortcut | Action     |
| -------- | ---------- |
| `F`      | Frame      |
| `U`      | Round      |
| `T`      | Text       |
| `S`      | Stack      |
| `L`      | Link       |
| `Space`  | Pan Canvas |

cards.title: Graphics
cards.body:
| Shortcut          | Action    |
| ----------------- | --------- |
| `G`               | Graphic   |
| `P`               | Path      |
| `R`               | Rectangle |
| `O`               | Oval      |
| `V`               | Vector    |
| `Cmd` `G`         | Group     |
| `Cmd` `Shift` `G` | Ungroup   |

cards.title: Layout
cards.body:
| Shortcut            | Action         |
| ------------------- | -------------- |
| `Cmd` `Enter`       | Add Frame      |
| `Cmd` `Opt` `Enter` | Add Stack      |
| `Cmd` `Del`         | Remove Wrapper |
| `Cmd` `Opt` `Up`    | Move Forward   |
| `Cmd` `Opt` `Down`  | Move Backward  |

cards.title: Components
cards.body:
| Shortcut          | Action             |
| ----------------- | ------------------ |
| `Cmd` `K`         | Create from Design |
| `Cmd` `Shift` `K` | Create from Code   |

cards.title: Text
cards.body:
| Shortcut  | Action          |
| --------- | --------------- |
| `Cmd` `B` | Bold            |
| `Cmd` `I` | Italic          |
| `Cmd` `U` | Underline       |
| `Cmd` `T` | Select Typeface |

cards.title: Editing
cards.body:
| Shortcut                 | Action              |
| ------------------------ | ------------------- |
| `Cmd` `(arrows)`         | Object Size         |
| `Cmd` `Shift` `(arrows)` | Object Size by 10px |
| `0-9`                    | Opacity             |
| `Opt`                    | Show Distance       |
| `Cmd` `D`                | Duplicate in Place  |
| `Cmd` `Opt` `C`          | Copy Style          |
| `Cmd` `Opt` `V`          | Paste Style         |
| `Ctrl` `C`               | Color Picker        |
| `Cmd` `A`                | Select All Layers   |
| `Cmd` `Shift` `A`        | Select All Siblings |
| `Cmd` `Opt` `A`          | Select All Children |

cards.title: View
cards.body:
| Shortcut   | Action                |
| ---------- | --------------------- |
| `Z`        | Zoom                  |
| `Cmd` `+`  | Zoom In               |
| `Cmd` `-`  | Zoom Out              |
| `Cmd` `1`  | Zoom to Fit           |
| `Cmd` `2`  | Zoom to Fit Selection |
| `Cmd` `0`  | Zoom to 100%          |
| `Ctrl` `R` | Show Rulers           |
